text: Mario Ngqiuyomizi Saliwa (6 March 1984 - 31 May 2015) was a South African first-class cricketer. He played for teams such as the Eagles and Free State. He was born in King William's Town, Eastern Cape. Saliwa died after being stabbed on 31 May 2015, aged 31. ==References== ==Other websites== * Player profile: Mario Saliwa from ESPNcricinfo Category:1984 births Category:2015 deaths Category:South African cricketers Category:Murder victims
title: Mario Saliwa
